#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
bool palin(ll n)
{
	ll temp=n,rev=0;
	while(temp)
	{
		rev=(rev*10)+(temp%10);
		temp/=10;
	}
	return(rev==n);
}
int main() {
	ll t,n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		n++;
		while(!palin(n))
		{	
			n++;
			//cout<<n<<endl;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",n);
	}
	return 0;
}
